mapper.select: select A.Equip_WorkOrder_Code, B.Equipment_Info_Name Equip_WorkOrder_Name, A.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode, C.Product_Item_Name Equip_WorkOrder_ItemName, B.Equipment_Type FROM Equip_WorkOrder_tbl A inner join Equipment_Info_tbl B on A.Equip_WorkOrder_Code = B.Equipment_Info_Code and B.Equipment_Type = '325' inner join Product_Info_tbl C on A.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode = C.Product_Item_Code where A.WorkOrder_ItemCode = #{itemCode}

select A.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode FROM Equip_WorkOrder_tbl A inner join Equipment_Info_tbl B on A.Equip_WorkOrder_Code = B.Equipment_Info_Code inner join Product_Info_tbl C on A.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode = C.Product_Item_Code where A.Equip_WorkOrder_Code = #{WorkOrder_EquipCode}

select A.Equip_WorkOrder_Code, B.Equipment_Info_Name Equip_WorkOrder_Name, A.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode, C.Product_Item_Name Equip_WorkOrder_ItemName, B.Equipment_Type, sum(D.CL_ProductionQty) CL_ProductionQty FROM Equip_WorkOrder_tbl A inner join Equipment_Info_tbl B on A.Equip_WorkOrder_Code = B.Equipment_Info_Code and B.Equipment_Type = '325' inner join Product_Info_tbl C on A.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode = C.Product_Item_Code inner join Crate_Lot_tbl D on A.Equip_WorkOrder_Code = D.CL_MachineCode2 inner join Crate_tbl E on D.CL_LotNo = E.C_Production_LotNo and E.C_Condition = '3' where A.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode = #{itemCode} group by A.Equip_WorkOrder_Code
mapper.insert: insert into Equip_WorkOrder_tbl ( Equip_WorkOrder_Code, Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode, Equip_WorkOrder_Date ) values ( #{WorkOrder_EquipCode}, #{WorkOrder_ItemCode}, now() ) on duplicate key update Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode = #{WorkOrder_ItemCode}, Equip_WorkOrder_Date = now()
mapper.update: update Equip_WorkOrder_tbl set Equip_WorkOrder_Code = #{WorkOrder_EquipCode}, Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode = #{WorkOrder_ItemCode}, Equip_WorkOrder_Date = now() where Equip_WorkOrder_Code = #{WorkOrder_EquipCode}
